findings.title: CloudTrail centralized retention partially implemented
findings.description: Retention was standardized, but not all regions route to the centralized log destination yet.

recommended_actions.title: Complete centralized log routing for remaining regions
recommended_actions.description: Ensure all regions forward audit logs to the centralized destination with integrity controls.

findings.title: Dev network segmentation in progress
findings.description: Subnet tiering exists for core services but security group baselines remain inconsistent across teams.

recommended_actions.title: Standardize security group templates across teams
recommended_actions.description: Publish and enforce approved templates; reduce broad ingress/egress rules and enforce reviews.

findings.title: Tagging standard defined but not fully enforced
findings.description: Minimum tagging policy exists, but enforcement coverage is incomplete across legacy resources.

recommended_actions.title: Expand tagging enforcement to legacy resource classes
recommended_actions.description: Add policy-as-code enforcement for remaining services and establish remediation SLAs.

findings.title: Alert tuning backlog for identity and network signals
findings.description: Logs are onboarded, but alert thresholds and routing need tuning to reduce false positives and improve response.

recommended_actions.title: Tune alerts and incident routing for critical signals
recommended_actions.description: Define high-signal detections, tune thresholds, and integrate incident routing to on-call practices.

findings.title: Service principal credential review incomplete
findings.description: Privileged service principals exist, but credential lifecycle review and rotation evidence is incomplete.

recommended_actions.title: Implement credential review cadence and rotation evidence
recommended_actions.description: Define review cadence, rotate privileged credentials, and capture evidence via pipeline/audit logs.
